text: Arasye allahe te'omra raachulaka saponato yathayathabharae satyata parainata karai diche, allahara icchata tomaloke arasye niraapade mura khuraoraa'i arau culi cuti karai nirbhaye machajidula haraamata praraesa karaiba. Eteke te'om se'ito jane yito tomaloke najana. Seye iyara bahirae'o te'om tomalokaka pradana karaiche eta sadya bijaya
